title: FUKU+
seo_description: Located right behind Milk Bar is the answer to a Momofuku craving satisfied in a fast food environment. David Chang’s latest venture features their version of a fried chicken sandwich, collaborations with other great chefs like Danny Bowien of Mission Chinese, and a secret menu including Juicy Lucy burgers and The Koreano chicken sandwich.
contents:
Minime
15 W 56th St
walk: 7 minutes

Located right behind Milk Bar is the answer to a Momofuku craving satisfied in a fast food environment. David Chang’s latest venture features their version of a fried chicken sandwich, collaborations with other great chefs like Danny Bowien of Mission Chinese, and a secret menu including Juicy Lucy burgers and The Koreano chicken sandwich.
